00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_MODULE_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_MODULE_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePrerequisites.h"
00030 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034         typedef unsigned short ModuleTypeId;
00035         enum
00036         {
00037                 MODULE_PERLIN=0,
00038                 MODULE_BILLOW=1,
00039                 MODULE_ADDITION=2,
00040                 MODULE_ABSOLUTE=3,
00041                 MODULE_BLEND=4,
00042                 MODULE_CHECKERBOARD=5,
00043                 MODULE_CLAMP=6,
00044                 MODULE_CONSTANT=7,
00045                 MODULE_CURVE=8,
00046                 MODULE_EXPONENT=9,
00047                 MODULE_INVERT=10,
00048                 MODULE_MAXIMUM=11,
00049                 MODULE_MINIMUM=12,
00050                 MODULE_MULTIPLY=13,
00051                 MODULE_POWER=14,
00052                 MODULE_RIDGEDMULTI=15,
00053                 MODULE_SCALEBIAS=16,
00054                 MODULE_SELECT=17,
00055                 MODULE_SCALEPOINT=18,
00056                 MODULE_TURBULENCE=19,
00057                 MODULE_TERRACE=20,
00058                 MODULE_TRANSLATEPOINT=21,
00059                 MODULE_VORONOI=22
00060         };
00061 
00062 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00063         namespace utils
00064         {
00065                 class InStream;
00066                 class OutStream;
00067         };
00068 #endif
00069 
00071         class Module
00072         {
00073                 protected:
00075                         const Module **mSourceModules;
00077                         size_t mSourceModuleCount;
00078 
00079                 public:
00081                         Module (size_t sourceModuleCount=0) : mSourceModules(NULL), mSourceModuleCount(sourceModuleCount)
00082                         {
00083                                 if (mSourceModuleCount)
00084                                 {
00085                                         mSourceModules = new const Module *[mSourceModuleCount];
00086                                         memset (mSourceModules, 0, mSourceModuleCount*sizeof(Module*));
00087                                 }
00088                         }
00090                         size_t getSourceModuleCount () const
00091                         {
00092                                 return mSourceModuleCount;
00093                         }
00096                         bool walkTree (const Module *module) const
00097                         {
00098                                 for (size_t i=0;i<mSourceModuleCount;++i)
00099                                 {
00100                                         if (mSourceModules[i] == module)
00101                                                 return true;
00102                                 }
00103                                 for (size_t i=0;i<mSourceModuleCount;++i)
00104                                 {
00105                                         if (mSourceModules[i] && mSourceModules[i]->walkTree(module))
00106                                                 return true;
00107                                 }
00108                                 return false;
00109                         }
00113                         void setSourceModule (size_t id, const Module *module)
00114                         {
00115                                 NoiseAssertRange (id, mSourceModuleCount);
00116                                 NoiseAssert (module != NULL, module);
00117                                 NoiseAssert (module != this, module);
00118                                 NoiseAssert (!module->walkTree(this), module);
00119                                 mSourceModules[id] = module;
00120                         }
00122                         void setSourceModule (size_t id, const Module &module)
00123                         {
00124                                 setSourceModule (id, &module);
00125                         }
00127                         const Module *getSourceModule (size_t id) const
00128                         {
00129                                 NoiseAssertRange (id, mSourceModuleCount);
00130                                 return mSourceModules[id];
00131                         }
00133                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const = 0;
00135                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const = 0;
00137                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const = 0;
00139                         ElementID addToPipe (Pipeline1D &pipe) const
00140                         {
00141                                 return addToPipeline(&pipe);
00142                         }
00144                         ElementID addToPipe (Pipeline2D &pipe) const
00145                         {
00146                                 return addToPipeline(&pipe);
00147                         }
00149                         ElementID addToPipe (Pipeline3D &pipe) const
00150                         {
00151                                 return addToPipeline(&pipe);
00152                         }
00154                         virtual ModuleTypeId getType() const = 0;
00155                         virtual ~Module ()
00156                         {
00157                                 if (mSourceModules)
00158                                 {
00159                                         delete[] mSourceModules;
00160                                         mSourceModules = NULL;
00161                                 }
00162                         }
00163 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00165                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00167                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00168 #endif
00169         };
00170 
00171         #define NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules \
00172                 for (size_t n=0;n<mSourceModuleCount;++n) \
00173                 { \
00174                         if (!mSourceModules[n]) \
00175                                 NoiseThrowNoModuleException; \
00176                 }
00177 
00179         template <class Element1D, class Element2D, class Element3D>
00180         class SingleSourceModule : public Module
00181         {
00182                 public:
00184                         SingleSourceModule() : Module(1)
00185                         {
00186                         }
00188                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00189                         {
00190                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00191                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00192                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new Element1D(pipe, first));
00193                         }
00195                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00196                         {
00197                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00198                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00199                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new Element2D(pipe, first));
00200                         }
00202                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00203                         {
00204                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00205                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00206                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new Element3D(pipe, first));
00207                         }
00208         };
00209 
00211         template <class Element1D, class Element2D, class Element3D>
00212         class DualSourceModule : public Module
00213         {
00214                 public:
00216                         DualSourceModule() : Module(2)
00217                         {
00218                         }
00220                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00221                         {
00222                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00223                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00224                                 ElementID second = getSourceModule(1)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00225                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new Element1D(pipe, first, second));
00226                         }
00228                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00229                         {
00230                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00231                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00232                                 ElementID second = getSourceModule(1)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00233                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new Element2D(pipe, first, second));
00234                         }
00236                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00237                         {
00238                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00239                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00240                                 ElementID second = getSourceModule(1)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00241                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new Element3D(pipe, first, second));
00242                         }
00243         };
00244 
00246         class TripleSourceModuleBase : public Module
00247         {
00248                 public:
00250                         TripleSourceModuleBase() : Module(3)
00251                         {
00252                         }
00254                         void setControlModule (const Module &module)
00255                         {
00256                                 setSourceModule (2, module);
00257                         }
00259                         void setControlModule (const Module *module)
00260                         {
00261                                 setSourceModule (2, module);
00262                         }
00264                         const Module *getControlModule () const
00265                         {
00266                                 return getSourceModule(2);
00267                         }
00268         };
00269 
00271         template <class Element1D, class Element2D, class Element3D>
00272         class TripleSourceModule : public TripleSourceModuleBase
00273         {
00274                 public:
00276                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00277                         {
00278                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00279                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00280                                 ElementID second = getSourceModule(1)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00281                                 ElementID third = getSourceModule(2)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00282                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new Element1D(pipe, first, second, third));
00283                         }
00285                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00286                         {
00287                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00288                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00289                                 ElementID second = getSourceModule(1)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00290                                 ElementID third = getSourceModule(2)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00291                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new Element2D(pipe, first, second, third));
00292                         }
00294                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00295                         {
00296                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00297                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00298                                 ElementID second = getSourceModule(1)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00299                                 ElementID third = getSourceModule(2)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00300                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new Element3D(pipe, first, second, third));
00301                         }
00302         };
00303 };
00304 
00305 #endif
